ESL090.name: Intensive English for Non-native Speakers
ESL090.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year, Summer of every year
ESL090.description: Explanation and intensive practice of English skills. Focus on low-beginning grammar, speaking, listening, reading, and writing.
ESL090.restrictions: Open to English Language Center students.

ESL091.name: Intensive English for Non-native Speakers I
ESL091.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year, Summer of every year
ESL091.description: Explanation and intensive practice of English skills. Focus on beginning grammar, speaking, listening, reading, and writing.
ESL091.prerequisite: (ESL 090) or designated score on English Language Center test
ESL091.restrictions: Open to English Language Center students.

ESL092.name: Intensive English for Non-native Speakers II
ESL092.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year, Summer of every year
ESL092.description: Explanation and intensive practice of English skills. Focus on low-intermediate grammar, speaking, listening, reading, and writing.
ESL092.prerequisite: (ESL 091) or designated score on English Language Center test
ESL092.restrictions: Open to English Language Center students.

ESL093.name: Intensive English for Non-native Speakers III
ESL093.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year, Summer of every year
ESL093.description: Explanation and intensive practice of English skills. Focus on intermediate grammar, speaking, listening, reading, and writing.
ESL093.prerequisite: (ESL 092) or designated score on English Language Center test
ESL093.restrictions: Open to English Language Center students.

ESL094.name: Intensive English for Non-native Speakers IV
ESL094.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year, Summer of every year
ESL094.description: Explanation and intensive practice of English skills. Focus on high intermediate grammar, speaking, listening, reading, and writing.
ESL094.prerequisite: (ESL 093) or designated score on English Language Center test
ESL094.restrictions: Open to English Language Center students.
